snippet: A proposal by Cuomo to build the country’s largest convention center would free up the land occupied by the Javits Convention Center, but some experts doubt the Queens complex could succeed.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo proposes construction of the country’s largest convention center at the Aqueduct racetrack in Jamaica, Queens; plan would allow the sale of the land currently occupied by the much-maligned Javits Convention Center, on Manhattan's West Side, potentially fetching billions of dollars from developers.
lead_paragraph: A proposal by Cuomo to build the country’s largest convention center would free up the land occupied by the Javits Convention Center, but some experts doubt the Queens complex could succeed.

headline.seo: Cuomo Proposes Convention Center at Aqueduct in Queens
headline.main: A Convention Center at Aqueduct Is Urged
headline.print_headline: A Convention Center at Aqueduct Is Urged
